long_description:
Adds Lignite, an ore of coal, to NodeCore. Burning wood is no longer the only way to get fuel.
 Now outdated, please use NodeCore Coal instead. 
https://content.minetest.net/packages/Winter94/wc_coal/

Thank you,      

					--Winter94 (WintersKnight) (WintersKnight94)
name: nc_lignite
short_description: Adds Lignite, an ore of coal. Now outdated, please use NodeCore Coal instead. See Below.
title: NodeCore Lignite
